<style>
    .tb table.collapsible {
        width: 1008px;
        border-collapse: collapse;
        margin: 50px auto;
        font-family: 'Calibri (Body)';
    }

    .tb .collapsible td {
        padding: 10px;
        border: 1px solid #ccc;
        text-align: center;
        font-size: 16px;
    }

    .tb {
        margin: 10px 0;
    }

    .tb span+span,
    .collapsible {
        display: none;
    }

    .tb input[type="checkbox"]:checked ~ span {
        display: none;
    }

    .tb input[type="checkbox"]:checked ~ span+span {
        display: inline;
    }

    .tb input[type="checkbox"]:checked ~ .collapsible {
        display: table;
    }

    .tb a {
        color: #3498db; /* Set link color */
        text-decoration: none; /* Remove underlines */
    }

    .tb a:hover {
        text-decoration: underline; /* Add underline on hover */
    }
</style>

<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $('[data-toggle="toggle"]').change(function () {
            $(this).parents('.tb').find('.collapsible').toggle();
        });
    });
</script>
